cs.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Váš ověřovací kód je neplatný.

Prosím, ujistěte se, že URL adresu vám odeslanou jste zkopírovali a vložili celou.
cs.auth.authorize.invalid.heading: Chyba ověřování
cs.auth.authorize.success_growl: Probíhá přesměrování na váš uživatelský Game Jolt panel.
cs.auth.forgot_link: Zapomněl/a jsem uživatelské jméno či heslo
cs.auth.forgot.email_help: Vložte e-mailovou adresu vašeho účtu a my vám na ni odešleme odpovídající přihlašovací údaje.
cs.auth.forgot.heading: Obdržení přihlašovacích údajů
cs.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Hmm, tuhle e-mailovou adresu nemáme v systému. Určitě jste se zaregistrovali?
cs.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Odeslali jsme přihlašovací údaje na e-mailovou adresu vámi zadanou.
cs.auth.forgot.sent.heading: Přihlašovací údaje byly odeslány.
cs.auth.forgot.sent.spam: V případě, že nedostanete náš e-mail do deseti minut, zkontrolujte vaši spam složku, mohla tam skončit!
cs.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Předtím, než se budete moci na Game Jolt přihlásit, musíte potvrdit e-mailovou adresu vašeho účtu.

Zaslali jsme vám e-mail s instrukcemi, jak na to.
cs.auth.join.almost.heading: Už to skoro máme!
cs.auth.join.almost.spam: V případě, že nespatříte naši zprávu během deseti minut, zkontrolujte vaši spam složku, mohla tam skončit!
cs.auth.join.almost.urgency: Mějte na vědomí, že pokud nepotvrdíte registraci vašeho účtu do jednoho týdne, účet bude odstraněn.
cs.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.dup:
E-mailová adresa vámi vložená se zdá být již využívána jiným účtem.

Pokud již máte svůj Game Jolt účet, můžete se do něj přihlásit.

Pokud jste zapomněli vaše přihlašovací údaje, máte možnost je obdržet zde.
cs.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.ema: Pro dokončení přihlašování službou Twitter, vložte správnou e-malovou adresu.
cs.auth.reset_password.heading: Obnovit heslo
cs.auth.reset_password.password_help: Pokud si přejete obnovit vaše heslo, je potřeba zadat nové.
cs.auth.join.join_message_html:
Připojte se k nám. Mwuahaha.
Máme hry.
Mwuahahaha!
cs.auth.join.page_title: Připojte se k Game Joltu - největší kolekci video her od nezávislých vývojářů
cs.auth.linked_account.facebook.created_gro: Váš účet byl utvořen. Je to bez problému od teď.
cs.auth.linked_account.facebook.duplicate_e: Emailová adresa na vašem Facebook účtu je již použita. Nemáš již založený účet?
cs.auth.linked_account.facebook.no_email_gr: Tvůj Facebook účet nevrátil emailovou adresu. Zkontroluj zda-li jsi ji ověřil přes Facebook.
cs.auth.linked_account.twitter.created_grow: Váš účet byl úspěšně vytvořen! Teď už to půjde hladce...
cs.auth.linked_account.twitter.failed_growl: Nemohli jsme se přihlásit pomocí Twitteru
cs.auth.reset_password.success_growl: Vaše heslo bylo resetováno, nyní se můžete přihlásit novým.
cs.chat.no_friends_message_html: Najděte si přátele a hrajte s nimi!
cs.dash.avatar.body_html:
Momentálně používáme Gravatar (Globally Recognized Avatars) pro podporu avatarů na Game Joltu.

V připadě, že ještě nemáte Gravatar účet, stisknutím tlačítka dole otevřete stránku gravatar.com na které si můžete jeden vytvořit. Mějte na vědomí, že od vás bude vyžadována registrace pomocí WordPress účtu. Cože? Vy ještě nemáte ani WordPress účet? Žádné strachy! Bude vám umožněna tvorba obou najednou.

Máte Gravatar účet? Skvělé. Jednoduše se přihlašte, uploadujte váš avatar a spojte jej s e-mailovou adresou, pod kterou jste se registrovali na Game Joltu. To je vše.

Je možné, že po aktualizaci avataru bude jeho zobrazení na Game Joltu nějakou chvíli trvat. Pokud se tak nestane podezřele dlouho, zkuste vyčistit cache vašeho internetového prohlížeče.
cs.dash.avatar.heading: Jak získat avatar?
cs.dash.change_pass.heading: Změnit heslo
cs.dash.change_pass.invalid_old_password_er: Heslo které jsi vložil není správné.
cs.dash.change_pass.no_match_error: Hesla která jsi vložil se neshodují. Zkontroluj zda-li jsou totožné.
cs.dash.email_prefs.heading: Nastavení e-mailu
cs.dash.email_prefs.notifications_descripti: Upřesněte, jaké druhy e-mailových oznámení si přejete od nás dostávat.
cs.dash.forms.image_filetype_help_html:
Tvůj obrázek musí být ve formátu PNG,JPG,nebo GIF. 
PNG je vysoce doporučeno , protože produkuje bezztrátový obraz.
cs.dash.forms.thumbnail_filetype_help_html:
Tvůj náhledový obrázek musí být soubor typu PNG, JPG, nebo GIF.
Animované GIFy umožňují hráčům získat představu o tvé hře.
Pro nepohyblivé obrázky doporučujeme soubory PNG, protože vytvářejí bezztrátové obrázky.
cs.dash.funds.withdraw.email_help: To musí být platná e-mailová adresa připojena k účtu PayPal .
cs.dash.funds.withdraw.form_help_html: Zkontroluj zda-li informace které jsi vložil jsou správné. Již po potvrzení je nebudeš moci změnit.
cs.dash.funds.withdraw.heading: Příjem z vybrání
cs.dash.funds.withdraw.page_help_html:
Please allow 3 days for withdrawals to be processed. At this time all withdrawals are processed through PayPal.

If you don't have a PayPal account, you will not be able to withdraw any money. Please be sure to sign up with a PayPal account before trying to withdraw funds.
cs.dash.games.add.fnaf_autotag_message_html: Zdá se, že tvá hra by mohla být fanouškovskou hrou, spinoffem, nebo neoficiálním pokračováním "Five Nights at Freddy's". Proto jsme přidali do popisu tvé hry #fnaf. Tento tag požadujeme u všech her inspirovaných od "Five Nights at Freddy's"
cs.dash.games.add.heading: Přidat hru
cs.dash.games.api.overview.data_items_toolt: The total number of stored global data items.
cs.dash.games.api.overview.heading: Přehled herního API
cs.dash.games.api.overview.page_help_html:
The Game API lets you spice up your game with scoreboards, trophies, cloud data storage, session logging, and more.

You can check the links below to see if the community has already written an API library or plugin for the engine/tool/language you use. Of course, you can always write one yourself and share it in the forums!
cs.dash.games.api.overview.page_help_link: Přečtěte si více o herních API ...
cs.dash.games.api.overview.scores_tooltip: Celkový počet skóre napříč všemi žebříčky, včetně skóre hostů.
cs.dash.games.api.overview.scores_users_too: The number of users with scores on any of the game's scoreboards. Does not include guests.
cs.dash.games.api.overview.trophies_exp_too: Celkové množství EXP za trofeje ve tvé hře
cs.dash.games.api.settings.heading: Nastavení Herního API
cs.dash.games.api.settings.page_alert_html: Nikdy nedávejte váš soukromý klíč nikomu! Váš herní klič je použit pro ověření požadavků API které jdou z vaší hry. Pokud se klíč dostane do neoprávněných rukou, mohou poslat falešné požadavky a předstírat, že je to vaše hra. A to není dobré!
cs.dash.games.builds.form.dimensions_help_h: These are the dimensions at which your browser build will be displayed.
cs.dash.games.builds.form.disable_right_cli: This allows you to disable right mouse click behavior. Only enable this if your game needs to intercept right clicks.
cs.dash.games.builds.form.no_platforms_erro: Vyber alespoň jednu platformu na které bude tvůj program fungovat
cs.dash.games.builds.form.platforms_help_ht: Zvolte "Ostatní", pokud je tato aktualizace na platformu která není zobrazena, nebo pokud je to nespustitelný soubor jako např. PDF.
cs.dash.games.data_store.items.heading: Data Storage Items
cs.dash.games.data_store.items.page_help_ht:
You can use the API to store data... in the cloud! All stored data items will show up here.

Currently, you can only view (and remove) globally stored data items. Stored user data items are not viewable at this time.
cs.dash.games.data_store.items.view.heading: Detaily předmětu
cs.dash.games.form.engine_other_why_tooltip: Tohle nám pomáhá lépe filtrovat nástroje, které lidé používají
cs.dash.games.header.page_help_html: Headers are the big, banner-like images that adorn the tops of game pages. For your header to look its best on mobile devices in portrait mode, make sure anything important is located near the center of the image.
cs.dash.games.header.page_help_link: What are the header requirements and guidelines?
cs.dash.games.hidden_message: Tato hra je v současné době skryta před veřejností.
cs.dash.games.hidden_message_unpublished: We recommend keeping it hidden until you've finished filling out the details and added some media. Don't forget to unhide it when it's ready, or it won't show up in the game listings!
cs.dash.games.maturity.page_help_html: Every game on Game Jolt, even works-in-progress, needs a maturity rating to describe its content. Accurate ratings and details about content help gamers make informed decisions. Remember, you can always come back later and make changes.
cs.dash.games.maturity.wip_help: If you don't know what the final content of your game will be, give an educated guess. You can make changes later.
cs.dash.games.media.add.image.page_help_htm: Add screenshots, concept drawings, photos of little clay models, fake box covers, or any other original art created for the game. Yes, even if it's a text-based game!
cs.dash.games.media.add.video.page_help_htm:
Add videos you've created, such as trailers, gameplay footage, walkthroughs, etc.

Please don't add Let's Plays or reviews. Let the content owners do that themselves in the comments.
cs.dash.games.media.image.form.caption_help: This caption will appear when your image is viewed in full screen.
cs.dash.games.media.page_help_html: Chceš, aby si lidé zahráli tvou hru? Přidej na svou stránku obrázky a videa. Doporučujeme přidat co nejvíc obrázků a videí, kolik jen můžeš--ikdyž je tvá hra celá psaná!
cs.dash.games.media.video.form.url_help_htm:
Nyní podporujeme pouze videa z Vimea a YouTube.
URL adresa by měla vypadat asi takhle:
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYYRHA0
Vimeo: http://www.vimeo.com/2619976
cs.dash.games.music.no_music_html: Nepřidal jsi žádnou hudbu. Nahraj pár písní pro svou hru! Hráči si hudby váží, věř nám!
cs.dash.games.music.page_help_html: Nech lidi užít si soundtrack tvé hry kdy se jim zachce! Nahraj MP3 soubory hudby ze tvé hry a objeví se na stránce tvé hry v pěkném malém přehrávači. Nenahrávej skladby chráněné autorským právem!
cs.dash.games.overview.publish_confirmation: Publishing your game makes it visible on the site, so make sure your game page is lookin' good!
cs.dash.games.overview.todo_info_builds_pro: You still have builds that are being processed. They won't show on your game page until they're finished processing.
cs.dash.games.packages.form.description_hel: This should be filled in only if it's needed, if the name alone isn't enough to distinguish this package from other packages.
cs.dash.games.packages.form.title_help_html: This is the name that shows up on your game page above the Download/Play button. For your main package, use the title of your game.
cs.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.head: Vydání
cs.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.hidd: Toto vydání je skryté a na stránce hry se do své publikace neukáže
cs.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.page: Releases represent new versions of your package. If you update a package, you should add a release. You can group all of the new builds for different platforms into a single new release.
cs.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.publ: This release is published and can be accessed from your game page.
cs.dash.games.packages.page_help_html:
Packages are how you organize and distribute your game's builds and other files.

Your primary package should contain the builds you want people to play. You can create new packages to contain additional files, such as level editors, art packs, expansions, and other DLC.
cs.dash.games.releases.builds.launch_option: Ajaj! Nenašli jsme žádné spustitelné soubory pro tuto platformu v archivu.

We've detected that this build is a standalone executable file.

It can be launched automatically.
cs.dash.games.releases.builds.processing_me: Processing build. It will become available in this release as soon as we're done.
cs.dash.games.releases.form.version_number_:
Version numbers are how you label releases.
Numbering should follow the format MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH.
Learn more about choosing a good version number...
cs.dash.games.scoreboard.form.asc_help: Skóre s nižší hodnotou jsou hodnocena lépe
cs.dash.games.scoreboard.form.desc_help: Skóre s vyšší hodnotou jsou hodnocena lépe
cs.dash.games.scoreboard.form.unique_help: Only show a user's best score?
cs.dash.games.scoreboards.heading: Scoreboardy
cs.dash.games.scoreboards.page_help_html:
The API allows you to add multiple customized scoreboards, with control over sorting options and guest scoring, and the ability to attach extra hidden data to scores.

The primary scoreboard is the one that will show by default on your game's page. Set a new primary by dragging a scoreboard into the first slot.
cs.dash.games.scores.list.heading: Podívat se na skóre
cs.dash.games.scores.list.page_help_html: These are all of the scores that have been submitted to this scoreboard by users and guests (if allowed).
cs.dash.games.scores.user.list.heading: Podívat se na skóre
cs.dash.games.scores.user.list.no_scores_ht: Tento uživatel na na tomto scoreboardu žádné skóre.
cs.dash.games.scores.view.data_none_help: Pro toto skóre nejsou žádná další data. Pole pro další data mlžeš použít k uložení informací, které ti pomohou zbavit se podvodníků a validovat skóre. Nikdy se neuáže uživatelům.
cs.dash.games.scores.view.heading: Detaily skóre
cs.dash.games.settings.ads_help_html:
Když toto vypneš, odstraníš tak z této hry všechny reklamy.

To udělej pouze, pokud nechceš svou hru zpeněžit, nebo pokud je hra předmětem licence, která zpeněžení nepovoluje.
cs.dash.games.settings.comments_help_html:
Turning this off will disable comments for this game and hide any comments already on the page.

The community will no longer be able to give you feedback via comments, but you may prefer this if your game contains sensitive or controversial material.

This will never remove comments from your game page—merely hide them. If you allow comments again in the future, all previously hidden comments will be restored.
cs.dash.games.settings.ga_tracking_id_help_:
Use Google Analytics to track a multitude of stats and get tons of information about your game page. Just enter your Google Analytics tracking ID here and we'll start sending data over there right away.

Here's how to set get started:

  • Create (or log into an existing) Google Analytics account.
  • Set up a new Property (go to the Admin tab and select Create new property from the dropdown menu under Property).
  • Select Website and enter gamejolt.com as the URL.
  • Select an Industry Category and a Reporting Time Zone.
  • Click Get Tracking ID.
  • Come back here and enter your Tracking ID.
  • You're all set!
cs.dash.games.settings.ratings_help_html:
Turning this off will disable ratings for this game and hide any ratings already on the page.

Your game's voltage will be calculated as if it had received no ratings. If you allow ratings in the future, the old ratings will be reapplied and your voltage will be recalculated.
cs.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_html:
A thumbnail is the little rectangular image that represents your game throughout the site. People can click it in game listings and search results to get to your game page.

Please don't choose an image that contains nudity, swear words, or adult-oriented imagery.
cs.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_link: Jaké jsou požadavky a nápovědy pro náhledový obrázek?
cs.dash.games.trophies.form.hidden_help: Skryté trofeje jsou skryté pro všechny kromě vývojáře hry kvůli testování a dalších hanebných důvodů.
cs.dash.games.trophies.form.secret_help: Tajné trofeje skrývají před hráči vše kromě svých názvů, dokud nejsou získány.
cs.dash.games.trophies.has_hidden_html: Máš skryté trofeje! Ujisti se, že je odhalíš když jsou připravené pro hráče k získání.
cs.dash.games.trophies.heading: Herní trofeje
cs.dash.games.trophies.page_help_html: The API lets you add multiple unique trophies, each forged from a material that indicates how difficult it is to achieve: bronze (easiest), silver, gold, or platinum (hardest).
cs.dash.integrate.exp_help_body_html:
To earn experience and level up, be sure to rate and comment on the games you play.

However, the fastest way to gather EXP is to achieve trophies and get onto scoreboards!
cs.dash.integrate.exp_help_heading: Získej zkušenosti s zvyš svou úroveň!
cs.dash.integrate.heading: Integrace
cs.dash.integrate.lead: Here's a to-do list of things to get you started with the site:
cs.dash.overview.heading: Your Dashboard
cs.dash.overview.revenue_tooltip: Game Jolt gives you a percentage of the ad revenue we make from your games on the site.
cs.dash.profile.edit.display_name_help: If you enter a display name, it'll show up on the site instead of your username. Unlike usernames, display names can contain spaces and special characters.
cs.dash.profile.edit.display_name_time_left:
You can only change your display name once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change your display name again.
cs.dash.profile.edit.heading: Uprav Tvoje Informace
cs.dash.profile.edit.username_time_left_htm:
You can only change your username once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change it again.
cs.discover.home.best_help: A sampling of the highest rated games of all time.
cs.discover.home.fireside_help: Indie hry, novinky, recenze a názory od lidí.
cs.discover.home.hot_help: Popular indie games, sorted by Hotness.
cs.game.download.game.downloading_wait_mess: Your download should begin in just a moment...
cs.game.download.game.rate_html: What did you think? Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!
cs.game.download.game.recommended_heading: Bude se ti možná také líbit
cs.game.download.soundtrack.downloading_wai: Your download should begin in just a moment...
cs.game.rating_growl.message: Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!
cs.game.rating_growl.title: Rate
cs.game.scores.no_scores_html: Nejsou zde žádné skóre na tabuli se skórem
cs.game.trophies.heading: Trofeje
cs.game.trophies.no_trophies_html: There are no trophies for this game yet. Bug the developer about adding some!
cs.games.list.date_descriptive_html: Games that were published on {{ date }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
cs.games.list.date_range_descriptive_html: Games that were published between {{ dateStart }} and {{ dateEnd }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
cs.games.list.featured_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} that we've featured on the homepage, sorted by feature date.
cs.games.list.freshness_tooltip: Freshness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's freshness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
cs.games.list.hotness_tooltip: Hotness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's Hotness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
cs.games.list.new_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} sorted by publication date.
cs.games.list.new_games_warning_html: Newly added games are not moderated, curated, or vetted by the community. You can find a goldmine of undiscovered talent or you may see some of the scariest shit of your life.
cs.games.list.voltage_tooltip: Voltage is our weighted rating system. All games start with an average score and the community drags it up or down.
cs.library.collection.developer_descriptive: These are the games made by {{ user }}.
cs.library.collection.developer_owner_descr:
These are the games that you've made. Be proud!
Feel free to share this page with others to show off your games.
cs.library.collection.followed_descriptive_: These are the games that {{ user }} is following.
cs.library.collection.followed_owner_descri:
When you follow a game, it shows up here.
You'll receive notifications when developers post news about any games you're following.
cs.library.collection.no_games_bundle_html: There are no games in this bundle yet.
cs.library.collection.no_games_developer_ht: This developer hasn't added any games yet.
cs.library.collection.no_games_followed_htm: No games are being followed yet.
cs.library.collection.no_games_playlist_htm: There are no games in this playlist yet, alas.
cs.library.description_html: This is your personalized library of games. Here dwell the games you've followed and any playlists or bundles that you've made or followed.
cs.library.heading: Knihovna Her
cs.library.nav.no_playlists_html:
Create playlists to organize and share the games in your library.

Follow other people's playlists to discover more games!
cs.library.playlists.developer_description: Here are the games created by this developer.
cs.library.playlists.followed_description: Here are the games this person is following.
cs.notifications.rating_details_html: And the value of the rating thou shalt receive is {{ rating }}. No more, no less.
cs.profile.no_bio_html: This person doesn't have a bio yet, so use your imagination!
cs.profile.no_developer_games_html: This developer hasn't published any games yet. Tell them to get a move on!

cs.dash.games.api.settings.generate_confirm: Are you sure you want to generate a new key? If you do, any builds of your game using the current key will stop working.
cs.dash.games.api.settings.generate_growl: Generated a brand new private key for your game. You'll need to update your game's code with the new key.
cs.dash.games.data_store.items.remove_confi: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
cs.dash.games.maturity.alcohol_1_descriptio: References to or images of alcoholic beverages.
cs.dash.games.maturity.bloodshed_3_descript: Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilation of body parts.
cs.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_1_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in unsafe situations.
cs.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_2_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.
cs.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving cartoon-like characters.
cs.dash.games.maturity.drugs_1_description: References to or images of illicit drugs.
cs.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_1_d: Depictions of characters in unsafe situations easily distinguishable from real life.
cs.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_2_d: Depictions of characters in aggressive conflict easily distinguishable from real life.
cs.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving situations easily distinguishable from real life.
cs.dash.games.maturity.gambling_2_descripti: Players can gamble using real money.
cs.dash.games.maturity.humor_1_description: Depictions of or dialog including slapstick humor.
cs.dash.games.maturity.humor_2_description: Depictions of or dialog including vulgar humor; bathroom humor.
cs.dash.games.maturity.humor_3_description: Depictions of or dialog including mature humor; sexual humor.
cs.dash.games.maturity.language_1_descripti: Mild or infrequent use of profanity.
cs.dash.games.maturity.language_3_descripti: Strong or frequent use of profanity.
cs.dash.games.maturity.nudity_1_description: Stručný zobrazení nahoty nebo umělecké nahota

cs.dash.email_prefs.notify_comment_replies_: Get emails about replies in comment threads you're watching or to which you've replied.

cs.dash.email_prefs.notify_game_follows_hel: Get emails when people follow your games and find out who they are.
cs.dash.email_prefs.notify_private_messages: Get emails when friends private message you and you're offline.
cs.dash.email_prefs.notify_ratings_help: Get emails when your games have been rated--and find out what ratings they were given.

cs.settings.limit_extractions_help: An extraction is when the game is unpacked and installed after downloading.

cs.settings.max_extract_count_help: If you have more than this number, extractions will be queued up.

cs.Automatic translations use Google Transl: Automatic translations use Google Translate and may not be completely accurate.
cs.Get notifications when people post new r: Get notifications when people post new replies to this thread.
cs.Let us know your thoughts and be the fir: Let us know your thoughts and be the first to comment!
You and another person like this comment: Vám a další osobě se líbí tento komentář.
Vám a několika dalším se líbí tento komentář.
Vám a %{ count } lidem se líbí tento komentář.
cs.system_report.form.description_help: Describe what this system report is about, any bugs you may have encountered, and how you can reproduce.
cs.system_report.send.heading: Send System Report
cs.system_report.send.help: This will send a system report to us with details about your device and client log. We don't collect personal information through this.
cs.system_report.send.issue_tracker: If you experienced a bug, please report it first on our issue tracker.
cs.system_report.sent_growl: Your system report has been sent.
cs.library.installed.change_location_messag: You can change the location where games are installed at any time in your Settings.
cs.library.installed.heading: Installed Games
cs.library.installed.no_games_message: Your installed games show up here... that is, once you have some!
cs.External link to play the game (not uplo: Externí odkaz pro hraní (není na této strance)
cs.Incorrect maturity rating for the conten: Nepřesné věkové hodnocení podle obsahu této hry
cs.It contains spoilers and doesn't use spo: Obsahuje spoilery a nepoužívá označení spoilerů
cs.It is hate speech or contains graphic co: Je to projev nenávisti nebo obsahuje grafický obsah?
cs.It is pornographic or contains sexually: Je to pornografický nebo obsahuje sexuálně explicitní materiály?
cs.It is spam or unwanted commercial conten: Je to spam nebo nežádoucí obchodní obsah?
cs.No information on game page (no screensh: Žádné informace na stránce hry (žádné screenshoty, nedostačující popis, stránka zástupce, atd.)
cs.Profile or username contains explicit or: Profil nebo uživatelské jméno obsahuje urážlivý materiál
cs.Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a p: Děkujeme, že nám pomáháte udělat Game Jolt místem pro každého. Podíváme se na to co nejdříve!
cs.Why are you reporting this?: Proč jste se rozhodli to nahlásit?
cs.dash.email_prefs.newsletter_help: Přejete si, abychom Vám zasílali emaily s novinkami, které obsahují aktualizace a oznámení o věcech, jako jsou například vlastnosti sítě, oficiální obsah a zajímavé hry?
cs.footer.client_promo.message: Play games faster with the Game Jolt Client!
cs.<strong>Be sure to remove or block ads f: Be sure to remove or block ads from showing in your browser games. We serve our own ads and share the revenue with developers. Domain names to block: gamejolt.com, *.gamejolt.com, gamejolt.net, *.gamejolt.net
cs.<strong>Java Applets have been deprecate: Java Applets have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Java Applet builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them. You can add .jar files as downloadables and the Game Jolt Client will correctly launch them for users instead.
cs.<strong>Most browsers have stopped suppo: Most browsers have stopped supporting the Unity Web Player. Please consider exporting to WebGL instead.
cs.<strong>Silverlight builds have been dep: Silverlight builds have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Silverlight builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them.
cs.<strong>The launch options you entered a: The launch options you entered are invalid. Make sure each selected file is in your build and that it works on the appropriate operating system.
cs.<strong>Your game is part of a jam that: Your game is part of a jam that locks builds during voting. You will not be able to add new builds until the voting period ends.
cs.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
cs.For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive c: For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive containing all of your build's files and assets. There must be an {{ filename }} file in the root folder.
cs.This build doesn't seem to be a Windows,: This build doesn't seem to be a Windows, Mac or Linux build, so we've marked it as "Other" for you.
cs.This build has more info to fill in befo: This build has more info to fill in before it will be available in this release.
cs.This build is not launchable on certain: This build is not launchable on certain platforms. They've been disabled below.
cs.This package has builds that are still p: This package has builds that are still processing. They will become available in the package as soon as they're finished processing.
cs.You don't have any builds in this releas: You don't have any builds in this release yet. You won't be able to publish until you put some in.
cs.Check your internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
cs.Oh no! We couldn't download this package: Oh no! We couldn't download this package. Perhaps check that you're still online?
cs.Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package a: Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package after downloading it. Maybe try again?
cs.There's been an error, and it's of the d: There's been an error, and it's of the dubious sort.
This game has no playable builds yet.
cs.This game used to have playable builds b: This game used to have playable builds but they have been removed.
cs.This package can not be installed on you: This package can not be installed on your system, but can be quick played in the client.
This package can not be installed on your system.
cs.We are having trouble connecting to Game: We are having trouble connecting to Game Jolt.
You are currently running this package. Some options have been disabled while it's open.
You do not have access to this page.
cs.You found a secret! But upon further ins: You found a secret! But on further inspection, you realize it's just an empty page.
cs.You do not have enough funds in your Wal: Nemáte dostatek peněz k dokončení této objednávky.
cs.You don't own any games yet. Go buy some: Zatím nevlastníš žádné hry. Jdi nějaké koupit!
cs.You have pending withdrawals amounting t: Máte probíhající výběry v počtu {{ ::overviewCtrl.revenuePendingWithdraw | currency:'$' }}.
cs.You haven't bought any games on the site: Ještě jste si nekoupil/a žádnou hru na této stránce. Když to uděláte, tak budete moct vidět všechny vaše objednávky i detaily pro každou objednávku zde.
cs.You must <a href=\"{{ url }}\">set up yo: Musíte si nastavit vaše peněžní informce než budete moct příjmat peníze.
cs.Your account is ready to sell games on G: Tvůj účet je připraven prodávat hry na Game Joltu! Tady můžeš nastavit další nastavení.
cs.Your Wallet is where your earnings will: Vaše peněženka je místo kde se budou ukládat vaše zisky pro kupování her na Game Joltu nebo je můžete uložit na svůj PayPal ůčet.
cs.Comments have been disabled for this gam: Komentáře byly vypnuty pro tuto hru.
Tohle jsou hry, které tento člověk vlastní
cs.There are multiple packages for your dev: Je tu hodně balíčků pro vaše zařízení. Prosím vyberte si jedno.
cs.Flash Web Playable: Hratelné na webu s Flash Playerem
cs.Java Applet Web Playable: Hratelné na webu s Java Applet
cs.Warm thanks from both {{ developer }} an: Velké díky od {{ developer }} a týmu Game Jolt.
cs.Five Nights at Freddy's Fangames: Fanouškovské hry: Five Nights at Freddy's
cs.It could contain content you may not wan: Může obsahovat obsah, který byste nechtěli vidět.
cs.Label: Označení
cs.Manage your game keys and give access to: Spravovat klíče či dát přístup uživatelům.
cs.Paste one email address per line, or sep: Vložte jednu emailovou adresu na každý řádek nebo, je oddělte čárkou.
cs.Paste one username per line, or separate: Vložte jedno uživatelské jméno na každý řádek, nebo je oddělte čárkou.
cs.Play with friends (if you have 'em), or: Hrajte s přáteli (jestli je máte), nebo proti vašim nepřátelům. Online nebo místní kooperace, všechny typy multiplayerových her jsou vítány.
cs.This game is tagged for mature audiences: Tato hra je označena pro plnoletou audienci.
Každý má přístup k tomuto balíčku.
cs.This package will only be available to y: Tento balíček bude k dispozici jen vám a všem klíčům, které mají přístup
cs.You can decide to have no minimum by set: Můžete se rozhodnout nemít žádné minimum nastavením na $0.
